tags.name: salesOrderRepositoryV1
tags.description: Order repository interface. An order is a document that a web store issues to a customer. Magento generates a sales order that lists the product items, billing and shipping addresses, and shipping and payment methods. A corresponding external document, known as a purchase order, is emailed to the customer.

tags.name: salesOrderManagementV1
tags.description: Order management interface. An order is a document that a web store issues to a customer. Magento generates a sales order that lists the product items, billing and shipping addresses, and shipping and payment methods. A corresponding external document, known as a purchase order, is emailed to the customer.

tags.name: salesOrderAddressRepositoryV1
tags.description: Order address repository interface. An order is a document that a web store issues to a customer. Magento generates a sales order that lists the product items, billing and shipping addresses, and shipping and payment methods. A corresponding external document, known as a purchase order, is emailed to the customer.

tags.name: salesOrderItemRepositoryV1
tags.description: Order item repository interface. An order is a document that a web store issues to a customer. Magento generates a sales order that lists the product items, billing and shipping addresses, and shipping and payment methods. A corresponding external document, known as a purchase order, is emailed to the customer.

tags.name: salesInvoiceRepositoryV1
tags.description: Invoice repository interface. An invoice is a record of the receipt of payment for an order.

tags.name: salesInvoiceManagementV1
tags.description: Invoice management interface. An invoice is a record of the receipt of payment for an order.

tags.name: salesInvoiceCommentRepositoryV1
tags.description: Invoice comment repository interface. An invoice is a record of the receipt of payment for an order. An invoice can include comments that detail the invoice history.

tags.name: salesCreditmemoManagementV1
tags.description: Credit memo add comment interface. After a customer places and pays for an order and an invoice has been issued, the merchant can create a credit memo to refund all or part of the amount paid for any returned or undelivered items. The memo restores funds to the customer account so that the customer can make future purchases.

tags.name: salesCreditmemoRepositoryV1
tags.description: Credit memo repository interface. After a customer places and pays for an order and an invoice has been issued, the merchant can create a credit memo to refund all or part of the amount paid for any returned or undelivered items. The memo restores funds to the customer account so that the customer can make future purchases.

tags.name: salesCreditmemoCommentRepositoryV1
tags.description: Credit memo comment repository interface. After a customer places and pays for an order and an invoice has been issued, the merchant can create a credit memo to refund all or part of the amount paid for any returned or undelivered items. The memo restores funds to the customer account so that the customer can make future purchases. A credit memo usually includes comments that detail why the credit memo amount was credited to the customer.

tags.name: salesShipmentRepositoryV1
tags.description: Shipment repository interface. A shipment is a delivery package that contains products. A shipment document accompanies the shipment. This document lists the products and their quantities in the delivery package.

tags.name: salesShipmentManagementV1
tags.description: Shipment management interface. A shipment is a delivery package that contains products. A shipment document accompanies the shipment. This document lists the products and their quantities in the delivery package.

tags.name: salesShipmentCommentRepositoryV1
tags.description: Shipment comment repository interface. A shipment is a delivery package that contains products. A shipment document accompanies the shipment. This document lists the products and their quantities in the delivery package. A shipment document can contain comments.

tags.name: salesShipmentTrackRepositoryV1
tags.description: Shipment track repository interface. A shipment is a delivery package that contains products. A shipment document accompanies the shipment. This document lists the products and their quantities in the delivery package.

tags.name: salesTransactionRepositoryV1
tags.description: Transaction repository interface. A transaction is an interaction between a merchant and a customer such as a purchase, a credit, a refund, and so on.

post.description: Return product prices. In case of at least one of skus is not found exception will be thrown.

Add or update product prices. If any items will have invalid price, price type, website id, sku, customer group or quantity, they will be marked as failed and excluded from update list and \Magento\Catalog\Api\Data\PriceUpdateResultInterface[] with problem description will be returned. If there were no failed items during update empty array will be returned. If error occurred during the update exception will be thrown.

put.description: Remove existing tier prices and replace them with the new ones. If any items will have invalid price, price type, website id, sku, customer group or quantity, they will be marked as failed and excluded from replace list and \Magento\Catalog\Api\Data\PriceUpdateResultInterface[] with problem description will be returned. If there were no failed items during update empty array will be returned. If error occurred during the update exception will be thrown.

post.description: Delete product tier prices. If any items will have invalid price, price type, website id, sku, customer group or quantity, they will be marked as failed and excluded from delete list and \Magento\Catalog\Api\Data\PriceUpdateResultInterface[] with problem description will be returned. If there were no failed items during update empty array will be returned. If error occurred during the update exception will be thrown.
Return product prices. In case of at least one of skus is not found exception will be thrown.

Add or update product prices. Input item should correspond \Magento\Catalog\Api\Data\CostInterface. If any items will have invalid price, store id or sku, they will be marked as failed and excluded from update list and \Magento\Catalog\Api\Data\PriceUpdateResultInterface[] with problem description will be returned. If there were no failed items during update empty array will be returned. If error occurred during the update exception will be thrown.
Return product prices. In case of at least one of skus is not found exception will be thrown.

Add or update product cost. Input item should correspond to \Magento\Catalog\Api\Data\CostInterface. If any items will have invalid cost, store id or sku, they will be marked as failed and excluded from update list and \Magento\Catalog\Api\Data\PriceUpdateResultInterface[] with problem description will be returned. If there were no failed items during update empty array will be returned. If error occurred during the update exception will be thrown.
Delete product cost. In case of at least one of skus is not found exception will be thrown. If error occurred during the delete exception will be thrown.
Return product's special price. In case of at least one of skus is not found exception will be thrown.

Add or update product's special price. If any items will have invalid price, store id, sku or dates, they will be marked as failed and excluded from update list and \Magento\Catalog\Api\Data\PriceUpdateResultInterface[] with problem description will be returned. If there were no failed items during update empty array will be returned. If error occurred during the update exception will be thrown.

Delete product's special price. If any items will have invalid price, store id, sku or dates, they will be marked as failed and excluded from delete list and \Magento\Catalog\Api\Data\PriceUpdateResultInterface[] with problem description will be returned. If there were no failed items during update empty array will be returned. If error occurred during the delete exception will be thrown.

post.description: Create a B2B quote based on a regular Magento quote. If the B2B quote requires a shipping address (for negotiation or tax calculations), add it to the regular quote before you create a B2B quote.
Submit the B2B quote to the customer. The quote status for the customer will be changed to 'Updated', and the customer can work with the quote.
Decline the B2B quote. All custom pricing will be removed from this quote. The buyer will be able to place an order using their standard catalog prices and discounts.

Refreshes item prices, taxes, discounts, cart rules in the negotiable quote as per the latest changes in the catalog / shared catalog and in the price rules. Depending on the negotiable quote state and totals, all or just some of quote numbers will be recalculated. 'Update Prices' parameter forces refresh on any quote that is not locked for admin user, including the quotes with a negotiated price. The request can be applied to one or more quotes at the same time.

sales-data-order-interface.description: Order interface. An order is a document that a web store issues to a customer. Magento generates a sales order that lists the product items, billing and shipping addresses, and shipping and payment methods. A corresponding external document, known as a purchase order, is emailed to the customer.

base_shipping_discount_tax_compensation_.description: Base shipping discount tax compensation amount.

sales-data-order-item-interface.description: Order item interface. An order is a document that a web store issues to a customer. Magento generates a sales order that lists the product items, billing and shipping addresses, and shipping and payment methods. A corresponding external document, known as a purchase order, is emailed to the customer.

base_weee_tax_applied_row_amnt.description: Base WEEE tax applied row amount.

sales-data-order-address-interface.description: Order address interface. An order is a document that a web store issues to a customer. Magento generates a sales order that lists the product items, billing and shipping addresses, and shipping and payment methods. A corresponding external document, known as a purchase order, is emailed to the customer.

street.description: Array of any street values. Otherwise, null.

sales-data-order-payment-interface.description: Order payment interface. An order is a document that a web store issues to a customer. Magento generates a sales order that lists the product items, billing and shipping addresses, and shipping and payment methods. A corresponding external document, known as a purchase order, is emailed to the customer.

cc_last4.description: Last four digits of the credit card.

sales-data-order-status-history-interfac.description: Order status history interface. An order is a document that a web store issues to a customer. Magento generates a sales order that lists the product items, billing and shipping addresses, and shipping and payment methods. A corresponding external document, known as a purchase order, is emailed to the customer.

base_shipping_discount_tax_compensation_.description: Base shipping discount tax compensation amount.

type.description: Type (shipping, product, weee, gift wrapping, etc)

item_id.description: Item id if this item is a product

associated_item_id.description: Associated item id if this item is associated with another item, null otherwise

company-data-company-order-interface.description: Order company extension attributes interface. Adds new company attributes to orders.

sales-data-order-search-result-interface.description: Order search result interface. An order is a document that a web store issues to a customer. Magento generates a sales order that lists the product items, billing and shipping addresses, and shipping and payment methods. A corresponding external document, known as a purchase order, is emailed to the customer.

sales-data-order-status-history-search-r.description: Order status history search result interface. An order is a document that a web store issues to a customer. Magento generates a sales order that lists the product items, billing and shipping addresses, and shipping and payment methods. A corresponding external document, known as a purchase order, is emailed to the customer.

sales-data-order-item-search-result-inte.description: Order item search result interface. An order is a document that a web store issues to a customer. Magento generates a sales order that lists the product items, billing and shipping addresses, and shipping and payment methods. sales-data-invoice-interface.description: Invoice interface. An invoice is a record of the receipt of payment for an order.

base_shipping_discount_tax_compensation_.description: Base shipping discount tax compensation amount.

comments.description: Array of any invoice comments. Otherwise, null.

sales-data-invoice-item-interface.description: Invoice item interface. An invoice is a record of the receipt of payment for an order. An invoice item is a purchased item in an invoice.

sales-data-invoice-comment-interface.description: Invoice comment interface. An invoice is a record of the receipt of payment for an order. An invoice can include comments that detail the invoice history.

sales-data-invoice-search-result-interfa.description: Invoice search result interface. An invoice is a record of the receipt of payment for an order.

sales-data-invoice-comment-search-result.description: Invoice comment search result interface. An invoice is a record of the receipt of payment for an order. An invoice can include comments that detail the invoice history.

sales-data-creditmemo-comment-search-res.description: Credit memo comment search result interface. After a customer places and pays for an order and an invoice has been issued, the merchant can create a credit memo to refund all or part of the amount paid for any returned or undelivered items. The memo restores funds to the customer account so that the customer can make future purchases. A credit memo usually includes comments that detail why the credit memo amount was credited to the customer.

sales-data-creditmemo-comment-interface.description: Credit memo comment interface. After a customer places and pays for an order and an invoice has been issued, the merchant can create a credit memo to refund all or part of the amount paid for any returned or undelivered items. The memo restores funds to the customer account so that the customer can make future purchases. A credit memo usually includes comments that detail why the credit memo amount was credited to the customer.

sales-data-creditmemo-interface.description: Credit memo interface. After a customer places and pays for an order and an invoice has been issued, the merchant can create a credit memo to refund all or part of the amount paid for any returned or undelivered items. The memo restores funds to the customer account so that the customer can make future purchases.

base_discount_tax_compensation_amount.description: Credit memo base discount tax compensation amount.

base_shipping_discount_tax_compensation_.description: Credit memo base shipping discount tax compensation amount.

base_shipping_incl_tax.description: Credit memo base shipping including tax.

base_shipping_tax_amount.description: Credit memo base shipping tax amount.

base_subtotal_incl_tax.description: Credit memo base subtotal including tax.

email_sent.description: Credit memo email sent flag value.

discount_tax_compensation_amount.description: Credit memo discount tax compensation amount.

shipping_discount_tax_compensation_amoun.description: Credit memo shipping discount tax compensation amount.

comments.description: Array of any credit memo comments. Otherwise, null.

sales-data-creditmemo-item-interface.description: Credit memo item interface. After a customer places and pays for an order and an invoice has been issued, the merchant can create a credit memo to refund all or part of the amount paid for any returned or undelivered items. The memo restores funds to the customer account so that the customer can make future purchases. A credit memo item is an invoiced item for which a merchant creates a credit memo.

base_cost.description: The base cost for a credit memo item.

base_discount_amount.description: The base discount amount for a credit memo item.

base_discount_tax_compensation_amount.description: The base discount tax compensation amount for a credit memo item.

base_price.description: The base price for a credit memo item.

base_weee_tax_applied_row_amnt.description: Base WEEE tax applied row amount.

sales-data-creditmemo-search-result-inte.description: Credit memo search result interface. After a customer places and pays for an order and an invoice has been issued, the merchant can create a credit memo to refund all or part of the amount paid for any returned or undelivered items. The memo restores funds to the customer account so that the customer can make future purchases.

sales-data-shipment-interface.description: Shipment interface. A shipment is a delivery package that contains products. A shipment document accompanies the shipment. This document lists the products and their quantities in the delivery package.

sales-data-shipment-item-interface.description: Shipment item interface. A shipment is a delivery package that contains products. A shipment document accompanies the shipment. This document lists the products and their quantities in the delivery package. A product is an item in a shipment.

sales-data-shipment-track-interface.description: Shipment track interface. A shipment is a delivery package that contains products. A shipment document accompanies the shipment. This document lists the products and their quantities in the delivery package. Merchants and customers can track shipments.

order_id.description: The order_id for the shipment package.

sales-data-shipment-comment-interface.description: Shipment comment interface. A shipment is a delivery package that contains products. A shipment document accompanies the shipment. This document lists the products and their quantities in the delivery package. A shipment document can contain comments.

sales-data-shipment-search-result-interf.description: Shipment search result interface. A shipment is a delivery package that contains products. A shipment document accompanies the shipment. This document lists the products and their quantities in the delivery package.
